price: Àwọn tó sì ṣàì gbàgbọ́ nínú àwọn āyah Wa, àwọn ni èrò ọwọ́ òsì.¹
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا هُمۡ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡمَشۡـَٔمَةِ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna kafarū biāyātinā hum aṣḥābu al-mashamati
